thread.title: Predict the Piglet Cookbook Champion for a Chance to Win
thread.title_full: Predict the Piglet Cookbook Champion for a Chance to Win

author: provided by
title: Predict the Piglet Cookbook Champion for a Chance to Win
text:
Predict the Piglet Cookbook Champion for a Chance to Win 1 / 1 Back to Gallery 
Our annual Piglet Tournament of Cookbooks is always full of twists and turns; upsets and underdogs prevailing. Who will take home the trophy?! 
But there are always frontrunners—books we overwhelmingly hear from you are the favorites. What's yours for this year's tournament? 
Tell us who you think will win—in the comments here or over on Facebook—for a chance to win all 16 books. If you're lucky, you could be cooking from these all year. 
In case you missed it: See this year's nominated books and judges here , and sign up for daily updates and exclusive recipes (!) from the books here . Official play begins on the 22nd.
